data.eml:eml: A new species of Bryconops Kner (Characiformes: Iguanodectidae) from the Rio Maicuru, lower Amazon basin, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silva-Oliveira, Cárlison, Lima, Flávio C. T., Bogotá-Gregory, Juan D. (2018): A new species of Bryconops Kner (Characiformes: Iguanodectidae) from the Rio Maicuru, lower Amazon basin, Brazil. Zootaxa 4514 (3): 372-382, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4514.3.4
